Articles.Content:
Good Afternoon Everyone!

I've been playing KSP for a while, but mostly have stuck to Steam or a non KSP forum with friends discussing the game. I came here to see what was coming up for the game and figured I probably should register since I've put in about 200 hours into the game and can't seem to stop playing it when I have time.

Some of my monstrosities: Link

And one of my favorites... with my dog Einstein as the flag: Link

That was my first Mun landing after the science update. I hadn't played for a while. I had grown used to MechJeb guiding me on my efforts. I've been playing with no mods now so every flight is a bit of an adventure for me. I'm getting much better at it and am starting to get better at interplanetary flights (which I was terrible at before). My next flight is a probe to land on Eve. It's on a collison course right now, but I won't get to finish the flight til tomorrow.

I really want to focus on building planes and getting better at docking now. I am terrible at both. Actually, I am terrible at everything in the game, but more terrible at those two things.

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear you've been enjoying the game. Sounds like you've accomplished quite a bit, despite your claims of being "terrible at everything," so don't sell yourself short! That being said, feel free to refer to some of the tutorials I've collected in the Drawing Board (conveniently linked through my signature) if you're still having trouble with your spaceplanes and docking efforts, since both of those tend to be particularly troublesome for many players.

Hope this helps!
Howdy! You'll find all kinds of great stuff on these forums. Tips, tricks, screenshots, stories, ideas for challenges, tutorials, you name it. One of the best (and friendliest) forums I've seen.

Welcome to the forums!

That being said, feel free to refer to some of the tutorials I've collected in the Drawing Board (conveniently linked through my signature) if you're still having trouble with your spaceplanes and docking efforts, since both of those tend to be particularly troublesome for many players.

Hope this helps!

That helps alot! Thanks.
Welcome to the forums! Enjoy your stay. : 3
Welcome aboard! I especially like your dog's name, haha. Reminds me of BTTF!

Welcome aboard! I especially like your dog's name, haha. Reminds me of BTTF!

Thanks! It was not intentional. Actually, my wife and I struggled with a name so I posted on a forum for name suggestions. Einstein was suggested and we both loved it for him.

We will not be naming any potential offspring in the same manner though.
